remarks: The image of a cyclic group under a surjective group homomorphism is cyclic.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cygctb.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ghmcyg.1 $e |- C = ( Base ` H ) $.
ghmcyg $p |- ( ( F e. ( G GrpHom H ) /\ F : B -onto-> C ) -> ( G e. CycGrp -> H e. CycGrp ) ) $.
